website_summaries.verdict: This is a good choice if you're looking for a durable portable washing machine that holds up well with regular use.
pros: Compact machine that stows easily in a cabinet
Holds up pretty well over time, even with regular use
cons: The drain hose is not as long as some users would like

customer_reviews.title: Nice tiny laundry machine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this few weeks ago for wash my son's clothes. He is too young and we don't want use public laundry machine to wash his clothes. Very easy to carry and move and it is very simply to use. Takes 20 minutes to do everything. Kind of mini but it is good for small amount of clothes washing. For this price I think it is really worth. Very like it.
customer_reviews.author: le

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Mini Washing Machine
customer_reviews.text: The Do Mini Portable washing machine is a very powerful one. It cleans cloths very well and the spin dry does a good job ... this is as good as a regular washing machine. Noise level is not bad also. I had a problem with the first one I received and emailed Do Mini about the problem, they replied soon and asked me in detail about the problem. I got back and email saying that problem can not be solved so easy so they will send me a new on and I can just recycle the old one. I received the new one within two days. Outstanding product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: more powerful than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It meets all my expectation for a mini washer. I use it mostly for the underwear, but it can load much more. The only problem is the inlet pipe does not fit right. So I put the washer in the tub, use the shower and the problem is solved.

customer_reviews.title: Big little machine
customer_reviews.text: I've given a less than 5 star review a few days ago, sorry changed my tune, but I found a way to use this washer by putting it on top of my kitchen counter in order to drain the water out of it. It works great . its light weight enough to lift it up there and I'm actually enjoying using it. It is super handy and washes very well. Very happy I purchased this item.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small places !! As well as good for the price . Only negative is that the process of use was complicated it was definitely a process still would have to hang dry the clothing . Would have to use the spin dry setting twice to get most of the water out of the load . Load capacity is small would only recommend doing small articles of clothing such as socks small dish towels and such .
customer_reviews.author: Amber Reterstoff

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I ran a load of 2 jeans, 3 T-shirt’s and 2 pairs of socks, it did a wonderful job. The spinner is smaller so I put 1/2 that load I ran into it, the laundry came out a little damp (as expected) and I just hung it all up to finish drying. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a alternative to huge appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T.

customer_reviews.title: nice size package with a punch
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure about purchasing, but I'm glad I actually did. It has made my house work a lot easier, especially since I can wash dishes and clean while the laundry is in the neighboring room. The washer is extremely powerful and cleans clothing better than the laundromat washers. The spin dryer also dries the clothes to the point where hanging them up for half hope to an hour will leave them completely dry. Best choice I've made, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne braddy

customer_reviews.title: This portable washer worked great for a while until a couple of weeks later ...
customer_reviews.text: This portable washer worked great for a while until a couple of weeks later the complete washer side of the machine just stopped spinning and couldn't wash any of my family clothes. I just kept on hearing the humming noise I think water seeped through the back and stopped the electricity from allowing to keep the machine spinning. Anyone purchasing this item it works great just try not to place it in the bathtub putting it in the bathtub find a dry surface to leave it in it will last much longer this way...

It is not automotic drain, you have to drain it after one wash cycle, fill it again by hands, wash it, drain it, until you feel your clothes are done.
